sqlMap.select: select ORDER_LIST_ID, ORDER_ID, CARD_ISSUE_FEE, PACKAGE_ID, PACKAGE_FEE, CARD_LAYOUT_ID, CARD_AMOUNT, REAL_AMOUNT, VALIDITY_PERIOD, TOTAL_PRICE, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_TIME, DATA_STATE, FACE_VALUE, FACE_VALUE_TYPE,SERVICE_ID,PRODUCT_ID from TB_SELL_ORDER_LIST where ORDER_LIST_ID = #orderListId:VARCHAR#

select ORDER_LIST_ID, ORDER_ID, CARD_ISSUE_FEE, PACKAGE_ID, PACKAGE_FEE, CARD_LAYOUT_ID, CARD_AMOUNT, REAL_AMOUNT, VALIDITY_PERIOD, TOTAL_PRICE, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_TIME, DATA_STATE, FACE_VALUE, FACE_VALUE_TYPE,SERVICE_ID,PRODUCT_ID from TB_SELL_ORDER_LIST
order by $orderByClause$
sqlMap.insert: insert into TB_SELL_ORDER_LIST (ORDER_LIST_ID, ORDER_ID, CARD_ISSUE_FEE, PACKAGE_ID, PACKAGE_FEE, CARD_LAYOUT_ID, CARD_AMOUNT, REAL_AMOUNT, VALIDITY_PERIOD, TOTAL_PRICE, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_TIME, DATA_STATE, FACE_VALUE, FACE_VALUE_TYPE,product_id,service_Id) values (#orderListId:VARCHAR#, #orderId:VARCHAR#, #cardIssueFee:VARCHAR#, #packageId:VARCHAR#, #packageFee:VARCHAR#, #cardLayoutId:VARCHAR#, #cardAmount:VARCHAR#, #realAmount:VARCHAR#, #validityPeriod:CHAR#, #totalPrice:VARCHAR#, #createUser:VARCHAR#, #createTime:CHAR#, #modifyUser:VARCHAR#, #modifyTime:CHAR#, #dataState:CHAR#, #faceValue:VARCHAR#, #faceValueType:CHAR#,#productId:VARCHAR#,#serviceId:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update TB_SELL_ORDER_LIST set ORDER_ID = #orderId:VARCHAR#, CARD_ISSUE_FEE = #cardIssueFee:VARCHAR#, PACKAGE_ID = #packageId:VARCHAR#, PACKAGE_FEE = #packageFee:VARCHAR#, CARD_LAYOUT_ID = #cardLayoutId:VARCHAR#, CARD_AMOUNT = #cardAmount:VARCHAR#, REAL_AMOUNT = #realAmount:VARCHAR#, VALIDITY_PERIOD = #validityPeriod:CHAR#, TOTAL_PRICE = #totalPrice:VARCHAR#, CREATE_USER = #createUser:VARCHAR#, CREATE_TIME = #createTime:CHAR#, MODIFY_USER = #modifyUser:VARCHAR#, MODIFY_TIME = #modifyTime:CHAR#, DATA_STATE = #dataState:CHAR#, FACE_VALUE = #faceValue:VARCHAR#, FACE_VALUE_TYPE = #faceValueType:CHAR#, SERVICE_ID = #serviceId:VARCHAR#, PRODUCT_ID = #productId:VARCHAR# where ORDER_LIST_ID = #orderListId:VARCHAR#

update TB_SELL_ORDER_LIST
ORDER_ID = #orderId:VARCHAR#
CARD_ISSUE_FEE = #cardIssueFee:VARCHAR#
PACKAGE_ID = #packageId:VARCHAR#
PACKAGE_FEE = #packageFee:VARCHAR#
CARD_LAYOUT_ID = #cardLayoutId:VARCHAR#
CARD_AMOUNT = #cardAmount:VARCHAR#
REAL_AMOUNT = #realAmount:VARCHAR#
VALIDITY_PERIOD = #validityPeriod:CHAR#
TOTAL_PRICE = #totalPrice:VARCHAR#
CREATE_USER = #createUser:VARCHAR#
CREATE_TIME = #createTime:CHAR#
MODIFY_USER = #modifyUser:VARCHAR#
MODIFY_TIME = #modifyTime:CHAR#
DATA_STATE = #dataState:CHAR#
FACE_VALUE = #faceValue:VARCHAR#
FACE_VALUE_TYPE = #faceValueType:CHAR#
SERVICE_ID = #serviceId:VARCHAR#
PRODUCT_ID = #productId:VARCHAR#
where ORDER_LIST_ID = #orderListId:VARCHAR#

update TB_SELL_ORDER_LIST
ORDER_LIST_ID = #record.orderListId:VARCHAR#
ORDER_ID = #record.orderId:VARCHAR#
CARD_ISSUE_FEE = #record.cardIssueFee:VARCHAR#
PACKAGE_ID = #record.packageId:VARCHAR#
PACKAGE_FEE = #record.packageFee:VARCHAR#
CARD_LAYOUT_ID = #record.cardLayoutId:VARCHAR#
CARD_AMOUNT = #record.cardAmount:VARCHAR#
REAL_AMOUNT = #record.realAmount:VARCHAR#
VALIDITY_PERIOD = #record.validityPeriod:CHAR#
TOTAL_PRICE = #record.totalPrice:VARCHAR#
CREATE_USER = #record.createUser:VARCHAR#
CREATE_TIME = #record.createTime:CHAR#
MODIFY_USER = #record.modifyUser:VARCHAR#
MODIFY_TIME = #record.modifyTime:CHAR#
DATA_STATE = #record.dataState:CHAR#
FACE_VALUE = #record.faceValue:VARCHAR#
FACE_VALUE_TYPE = #record.faceValueType:CHAR#
SERVICE_ID = #serviceId:VARCHAR#
PRODUCT_ID = #productId:VARCHAR#

update TB_SELL_ORDER_LIST set ORDER_LIST_ID = #record.orderListId:VARCHAR#, ORDER_ID = #record.orderId:VARCHAR#, CARD_ISSUE_FEE = #record.cardIssueFee:VARCHAR#, PACKAGE_ID = #record.packageId:VARCHAR#, PACKAGE_FEE = #record.packageFee:VARCHAR#, CARD_LAYOUT_ID = #record.cardLayoutId:VARCHAR#, CARD_AMOUNT = #record.cardAmount:VARCHAR#, REAL_AMOUNT = #record.realAmount:VARCHAR#, VALIDITY_PERIOD = #record.validityPeriod:CHAR#, TOTAL_PRICE = #record.totalPrice:VARCHAR#, CREATE_USER = #record.createUser:VARCHAR#, CREATE_TIME = #record.createTime:CHAR#, MODIFY_USER = #record.modifyUser:VARCHAR#, MODIFY_TIME = #record.modifyTime:CHAR#, DATA_STATE = #record.dataState:CHAR#, FACE_VALUE = #record.faceValue:VARCHAR#, FACE_VALUE_TYPE = #record.faceValueType:CHAR#, SERVICE_ID = #serviceId:VARCHAR#, PRODUCT_ID = #productId:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select distinct prod.product_name as "productName", ordList.Card_Amount as "cardAmount", ordList.Face_Value as "faceValue" from tb_sell_order_list ordList, tb_product prod where ordList.order_id=#orderId:VARCHAR# and ordList.data_state='1' and ordList.product_id=prod.product_id group by prod.product_name,ordList.Card_Amount,ordList.Face_Value
